issue.title: [C++] Clarify documentation about how to use external ARROW_PACKAGE_PREFIX while also using CONDA dependency resolution
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4873](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4873). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I will improve the documentation about this "hybrid" use case, where I need to pass

```Java

-DARROW_DEPENDENCY_SOURCE=SYSTEM -DARROW_PACKAGE_PREFIX=$TOOLCHAIN
```
